definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: Shakespeare' s sonnets are the only direct expression of the poet' s own feelings.
sentences.chinese: 這些十四行詩都是莎翁直抒胸臆的成果。

sentences.english: Shakespear wrote a lot of sonnets.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞寫了許多十四行詩。

sentences.english: Sonnets were a stylised way of demonstrating your technical skill.
sentences.chinese: 十四行詩在當時是展示個人技巧的流行方法。

sentences.english: The composer set a sonnet to music.
sentences.chinese: 作曲家爲一首十四行詩譜了曲。

sentences.english: He rhymed out sonnets in her praise.
sentences.chinese: 他寫成押韻的十四行詩歌頌她。

sentences.english: The lines have distinctly a sonnet rhyme-scheme, but look closely.
sentences.chinese: 這14行明顯使用了十四行詩的押韻規則，但仔細看。

sentences.english: It is a sonnet, too. It's a sort of song of a worker.
sentences.chinese: 也是一首十四行詩，是一個勞動者內心的歌。

sentences.english: Flamand returns to sing the sonnet he has just composed.
sentences.chinese: 不久弗萊米德返回，誦唱他剛剛完成作曲的十四行詩。

sentences.english: You will have sonnets and little bits of prose.
sentences.chinese: 包括十四行詩和少量的散文。

sentences.english: Jack was delivered of a sonnet on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 傑克就這個題目作了一首十四行詩。

sentences.english: Is a sonnet chanted by glistening waves.
sentences.chinese: 是波光影調吟誦的十四行詩。

sentences.english: He fell hard for Eric, writing sonnets to him.
sentences.chinese: 魯迪爲他創作了一首十四行詩。

sentences.english: He's making exactly the same disclaimer that he had made in Sonnet Seven.
sentences.chinese: 他發表了和他的十四行詩第七首中同樣的免責聲明。

sentences.english: For two weeks he worked hard at the sonnets.
sentences.chinese: 他費了二週認真研究十四行詩。

sentences.english: William Shakespeare' s sonnets comprise two trinities of truth, goodness and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞十四行詩集包含了兩個真善美的結合體。

sentences.english: Shakespeare's sonnets are the only direct expression_r of the poet's own feelings.
sentences.chinese: 這些十四行詩都是莎翁直抒胸臆的成果。

definition: surname Adorno/Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno 狄奧多·阿多諾|狄奥多·阿多诺[Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4] (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer
Shelley/abbr. for 珀西·比希·雪萊|珀西·比希·雪莱[Po4 xi1 · Bi3 xi1 · Xue3 lai2]
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
the implied message is deep (idiom); having deep implications
A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens 查爾斯·狄更斯|查尔斯·狄更斯[Cha2 er3 si1 · Di2 geng1 si1]
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
